SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterObserver
public class Game extends Object implements CharacterObserver
The Game class represents the main game logic.
It controls player movement, interactions with rooms and entities, combat, inventory management, saving and loading game data, and more.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(ArrayList<Floor> floors)
      Constructs a new Game object with the given list of floors.
      Parameters:
      floors - The list of floors in the game.

    • Game

      public Game(ArrayList<Floor> floors, long seed)
      Constructs a new Game object with the given list of floors and a custom seed.
      Parameters:
      floors - The list of floors in the game.
      seed - The custom seed used for generating random numbers in the game.

    • Game

      public Game(long seed, Floor currentFloor, Character player, ArrayList<Floor> floors, long creationTime, long elapsedTime, boolean backedUp, boolean hasEnded)
      Constructs a new Game object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      seed - The random seed used for generating random numbers in the game.
      currentFloor - The current floor the player is in.
      player - The player character controlled by the player.
      floors - The list of floors in the game.
      creationTime - The time at which the game was created.
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the start of the game.
      backedUp - A boolean flag that indicates whether the corresponding save file is on the cloud.

    • getAvailableDirections

      public String getAvailableDirections()
      Returns a string indicating the available directions for the player to move. The string includes symbols representing each valid direction and any special notes.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the available directions for the player to move.
